snippet: The Pentagon said on Friday it was considering a request from Malaysian Defense Minister Hishammuddin Hussein to provide undersea surveillance equipment to help in the search for the missing Malaysia Air Flight 370....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Mulling Undersea Surveillance Gear for Malaysia Plane Hunt
headline.main: U.S. Mulling Undersea Surveillance Gear for Malaysia Plane Hunt

lead_paragraph: The Pentagon said on Friday it was considering a request from Malaysian Defense Minister Hishammuddin Hussein to provide undersea surveillance equipment to help in the search for the missing Malaysia Air Flight 370.
